name: BallScape (Víctor Segura)
description:
In this game you must survive an infinite numbers of enemies with just a ball chained to you. All art and music excluding the pixel art font was made by us for this game jam.

This game has an online leaderboard, once you finish the game you can see the top 10 and publish your score. Will you be the best? :)

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme of Joined Together.

Controls:

  • WASD: Player movement
  • Mouse left click: Move the ball
  • Alt + F4: Close Game

Repository

  • https://github.com/mystic-games-team/BallScape

Authors

  • Víctor Segura
  • Oriol Capdevila

Credits:

  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/es/dogica.font
